data.title: Metrics
data.meta_description: An image generator with 20+ metrics about your GitHub account such as activity, community, repositories, coding habits, website performances, music played, starred topics, etc. that you can put on your profile or elsewhere !
data.text: {{ user }} has used {{ languages.length }} different language{{ format("plural", languages.length) }} for a total of {{ format("number", languages.total) }} byte{{ format("plural", languages.total) }}.
